entry.title: niteshpal-25/TodoApp-Frontend: Todo App is a simple, efficient, and lightweight task management application built using the FastAPI framework. It allows users to create, read, update, and delete tasks in a to-do list, making it easy to manage daily tasks or project to-do items.

entry.title: ChandanJain009/nodejs-nano-service: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

entry.title: mahinhussain1201/Status-Page-Application: A lightweight web application that enables organizations to monitor and display the status of their services in real-time. Administrators can manage incidents, service statuses, and updates, while users can access a public-facing dashboard to check the operational health of services.
entry.content: A lightweight web application that enables organizations to monitor and display the status of their services in real-time. Administrators can manage incidents, service statuses, and updates, while users can access a public-facing dashboard to check the operational health of services.
